snippet.title: Million on Mars: Space to Venture | Narrative Intro (Full Version)
snippet.description: This is the full intro to Million on Mars: Space to Venture, the hardcore open sandbox crafting MMO available on Steam. Meet Velma Patel and Leon Dusk, space tech billionaires united in a common goal - to get 1M people to immigrate to Mars and form a self-sufficient city within the next decade. Sharon Jones, COO Ad Astra Unlimited, is your guide as you enter the Austin Training Center and prepare your base for the first 20 settlers...
